name: Darts Classic
description:
Are you the master of darts ? Test your skills in a fun way !
There are 2 game modes waiting for you !

How to play:
Move your finger on screen left or right to aim. Next, tap once to start the power meter. The higher the power meter goes the higher your shot. After your first shot, the power meter will show the position on the power meter from your last shot. Have fun!

2 game Modes !
501 darts:
Score points to reduce your score from 501 to zero while trying to use as few darts as possible.
Once you go down to zero you need to get a bullseye to win.
Classic darts
Throw the dart in each zone from 1 to 20 and then hit a bullseye to win. Score doubles and triples for extra points!
